===============

**Tender Announcement**
======================

**Contract Name:** Accommodation Services (Niceville, Florida, USA)
---------------------------

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Number:** W8486-249660/A
------------------------------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites interested bidders to submit a proposal for the provision of accommodation services in Niceville, Florida, USA. This requirement aims to establish a sole-source contract for one (1) initial year, with the option to extend the term of the contract by up to four (4) one-year irrevocable option periods under the same conditions.

**Background:**
--------------

The estimated quantity of commodities required is ten (10) two-bedroom, two-bathroom dwellings, with a requested delivery date of July 8, 2024. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Scope of Work:**
-----------------

The successful bidder will be responsible for providing accommodation services to DND personnel in Niceville, Florida, USA. The scope of work includes the provision of two-bedroom, two-bathroom dwellings, with a minimum of ten (10) units. The Contracting Authority reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Submission Requirements:**
-------------------------

Bidders must provide the required information as detailed in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation. This information includes, but is not limited to, the bidder's contact details, company overview, and any relevant certifications or qualifications.

**Inquiries:**
-------------

Inquiries regarding this RFP requirement must be submitted to the Contracting Authority:

* Name: Chris Hunsley
* Email: [chris.hunsley@forces.gc.ca](mailto:chris.hunsley@forces.gc.ca)

**Important Dates:**
-------------------

* **Tender Closing Date:** June 21, 2024, at 12:00 p.m. (EDT)
* **Contract Award Date:** To be determined

**Attachments:**
----------------

The tender documents, including the RFP package and supporting information, may be accessed through the Canada Buys website:

* [www.canadabuys.ca](http://www.canadabuys.ca)

**Language:**
-------------

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Security Requirements:**
-------------------------

There are no security requirements associated with this requirement.
